warning.title: Please login
warning.text: You can't post or comment on posts!

rules.title: Rules forum
rules._1: The most terrible words in all galaxies are forbidden:
rules._1_1: For their use, you will be punished with the highest punishment!!!!!!
rules._2: Aggression, threats and insults against the editors or authors of materials are punishable by an immediate ban for a period of three days to life.
rules._2_2: p.s. but these are flowers if you violate the first paragraph!
rules._3: Calls to violate applicable law, racist statements, inciting ethnic and religious hatred, and everything else...
rules._4: Headlines should be no more than 100 characters and text no more than 1000
rules._5: Photos size no more than 1mb, audio no more than 5mb
rules.footer: And remember comrade! If you think you're right. You're wrong!
